name: flux-pwa
description: AI Music Mixer PWA with harmonic transitions

scripts.deploy:yc-func: cd yandex-cloud/functions/analyze-bpm && zip -r function.zip . && yc serverless function version create --function-name=analyze-bpm --runtime nodejs16 --entrypoint index.handler --memory 128m --execution-timeout 10s --source-path function.zip

author: Flux Team
